name: @erc3643org/erc-3643
description: A fully compliant environment for the issuance and use of tokenized securities implementing the ERC-3643 standard.

scripts.coverage:report: mkdir -p coverage && forge coverage --no-match-coverage "(test|scripts|dependencies)" --report lcov --report-file coverage/lcov.info && genhtml coverage/lcov.info -o coverage/report --branch-coverage && open coverage/report/index.html
